marklogic.body: Go to any Championship team and you will see the same formula. INSIDE OUT not outside in. If you want to see ball movement fine but it is easier to move the ball when you have a defense Off balance because the have to double. It is very simple Dallas did it last year with Dirk and Lakers did it with Kobe and Gasol, Boston used Pierce and Garnett, and the Heat won when the had Shaq and Wade in the low post. You don't win by just passing the ball on pick and rolls. You win in that low post. NOT ONE TEAM HAS WON EVER with D'Antoni's system.
